episode.content: COVID-19 has forced colleges to go online and young people to live under quarantine. What lies ahead for this possible "lockdown generation"? We discuss the topic with a panel of experts and students.
episode.description: COVID-19 has forced colleges to go online and young people to live under quarantine. What lies ahead for this possible "lockdown generation"? We discuss the topic with a panel of experts and students.
episode.subtitle: Lockdown's Harsh Lessons
episode.title: GLOBAL AGENDA

episode.content: Newly inaugurated US president Joe Biden faces mounting challenges, including deepening divides at home and rebuilding trust with the global community. Can he keep his promise to "build back better"?
episode.description: Newly inaugurated US president Joe Biden faces mounting challenges, including deepening divides at home and rebuilding trust with the global community. Can he keep his promise to "build back better"?
episode.subtitle: Biden's America: What Next for the World?
episode.title: GLOBAL AGENDA

episode.content: Digital technology, particularly AI, has played a key role in the fight against COVID. What are the new possibilities? How do we prevent it from going out of control? Experts debate what's to come.
episode.description: Digital technology, particularly AI, has played a key role in the fight against COVID. What are the new possibilities? How do we prevent it from going out of control? Experts debate what's to come.
episode.subtitle: AI and Digital Transformation in the COVID Age
